action.action-desc: Mr. Ribble introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to clarify the maintenance of effort requirement for local educational agencies.

section.header: Exception to maintenance of effort requirement for local educational agencies
section.text: Section 613(a)(2)(B) of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (20 U.S.C. 1413(a)(2)(B)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (iii)(III), by striking or at the end;
in clause (iv), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: the reduction of expenditures for employment related benefits provided to special education personnel such as pay, retirement contributions, annual and sick leave, and health and life insurance.

section.text: The amendments made by section 1 shall take effect beginning fiscal year 2016.
